Posts.Content: Dec 5, 2013 11:22AM Ramey wrote: I just joined this site because I too was just diagnosed stage 1 BC. Very uncertain and scared about everything. My surgeon suggested Lumpectomy and that was done last week. Going back in tomorrow For second surgery to get cleaner margins. I meet with oncologist Next week. My surgeon told me that there were no differences in Outcomes whether you choose lumpectomy or mastectomy, so I decided on the lesser . Hoping I made the right choice and I hope You can too!!!!
Posts.Title: Invasive Ductal Carcinoma - age 36.... oh crap!! Tam178 AndreaJ50
